name: txt_press
desc:
PRESS: Make PRESS F2 <property> to do something upon pressing F. Only some properties, like :(, will work!
It's a noun, and anything that refers to press will work for this purpose.

name: txt_2edit
desc: EDIT: Make PRESS F2 EDIT to unlock the level editor!

name: txt_2pley
desc: Can be used as a property that does literally nothing.

name: txt_f1
desc: Can be used as a verb that does literally nothing (and accepts properties).
